definitions.text: a playing card in the suit that has been declared trumps
examples: the ace of trumps is a sure winner

definitions.text: (card games) the suit that has been declared to rank above all other suits for the duration of the hand
examples: a trump can take a trick even when a card of a different suit is led

definitions.text: a brass musical instrument with a brilliant tone; has a narrow tube and a flared bell and is played by means of valves
produce a sound as if from a trumpet

examples: the goal was to best the competition

definitions.text: proclaim or announce with or as if with a fanfare
